product_meta.title: iLuv iSP245SIL Mo'Beats Portable Stereo Bluetooth Speaker Stand, Silver
product_meta.description:
Mo'Beats is a slim, compact portable stereo speaker stand with a cradle that supports your tablet or your smartphone. Unlike other stands, Mo'Beats allows for landscape and portrait viewing while also accommodating most cases. Opposing high-fidelity speakers on each end provide a wide sound stage for an exceptional audio experience, and the long-lasting rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides on-the-go convenience. If your mobile device doesn't have Bluetooth or if you want to save your battery, Mo’Beats also contains an aux-in to play your device. iLuv Creative Technology is the premier provider of the most comprehensive line of accessories for the mobile lifestyle. Born in New York City, the heart of design and innovation, iLuv has evolved into a worldwide premium brand garnering both media and consumer respect along the way. What sets iLuv apart is our commitment to innovation. Our products are designed by an in-house team of industrial designers and engineers, who also meticulously manage the technology to ensure the highest quality, making iLuv products distinct both from a design standpoint and from a quality standard. iLuv is a one-stop solution for all of your mobile lifestyle needs.

AMAZON.COM





Unlike typical Bluetooth speakers, which force you to hold your tablet upright, Mo'Beats allows you to enjoy hands-free, unobstructed viewing. View larger


A retractable stand stabilizes Mo'Beats while the aux-in port allows you to play almost any audio device. View larger


Built-in cradle allows you to watch and listen without interfering with the speakers or tablet screen and convenient carrying pouch is included to take Mo'Beats with you wherever you go



ISP245 MO'BEATS
Upgrade your tablet or smartphone with Mo'Beats from iLuv, a slim Bluetooth speaker that also functions as a stand. Set your tablet in the cradle in landscape or portrait mode and watch videos, play games, and run apps while enjoying high-fidelity sound and hands-free operation. It contains a Lithium-ion rechargeable battery for hours of playtime, making it an ultra-portable audio solution for your smartphone or tablet.



Charge Mo’Beats quickly and conveniently with your computer


Conveniently watch movies, play games and run apps with Mo'Beats. View larger

>  Slim, compact speaker stand with cradle for hands-free portrait or landscape viewing Opposing speaker orientation provides a wide sound stage and unobstructed viewing Built-in Mini-USB rechargeable lithium-ion battery for extended play Aux-in to play almost any audio device Bluetooth connectivity for wireless audio streaming 
COMPATIBLE WITH VIRTUALLY ALL SMARTPHONES AND TABLETS
The iSP245 Mo'Beats Portable Stereo Bluetooth Speaker Stand works with nearly any Apple or Android smartphone or tablet on the market. It's compatible with virtually all popular Apple devices, including iPod, iPod touch, iPad 1, 2 and 3, and all iPhones including the 4, 4S, and 5. It's fully Android-compatible as well, supporting the latest smartphones such as the Samsung GALAXY S III and HTC One, as well as all Android tablets including the Galaxy Note, Nexus 7, and Kindle Fire HD.

BLUETOOTH ENABLED
Mo'Beats is Bluetooth enabled, which means you can stream audio wirelessly. Just pair your device with Mo'Beats, and you're ready to go. For added functionality, a built-in cradle allows for hands-free viewing at a comfortable angle.

AUXILIARY IN FOR ADDED VERSATILITY
If your mobile device doesn't have Bluetooth or if you want to save your battery, there is an aux-in jack to play your device. The standard 3.5mm stereo jack supports any device that can support output to a 1/8" stereo plug.

WIDE SOUND RANGE
Mo'Beats features opposing high-fidelity speakers that set a wide sound stage. Watch movies and videos on the go, without compromising on an exceptional listening experience.

LONG LASTING RECHARGEABLE BATTERY
The Mo'Beats is equipped with a Lithium-ion rechargeable battery for up to 8 hours of playtime, which makes it an excellent solution for those who are constantly on the move. When it's out of power, simply connect the included charging cable to your computer's USB port to recharge.
